website_summaries.verdict: A two-sided whiteboard on wheels for convenient presentations anywhere.
pros: Large enough for a classroom yet compact enough for small gatherings
The board is magnetic and two-sided with wheels for portability
cons: Most buyers are satisfied, but a few complain of missing parts on delivery

customer_reviews.title: Nice Board
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice white board. Since I read the other reviews I was concerned about damage during shipping, so I had it shipped in an amazon box. The box was pretty rough when it got to me but the board was protected. It is a nice white board, is easily flipped, the surface is magnetic, and it is easily erased. I only have one negative thing to say and that is two of the screws WOULD NOT go into the stand. In the grand scheme of things it really doesn't matter because there are four on each side (two top and two on bottom) so it is definitely secure it's just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came missing all the parts???
customer_reviews.text: This literally came half open, missing all pieces of hardware and most of the poles. I don’t have any wheels or screws or clips - its just a big dry erase board and some metal poles. For 84 dollars this is really unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Ragnar redbeard

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing and no help from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this! I have been homeschooling for 18 years, and I could finally afford one of these. Then, it came in a damaged and very taped-up box with all parts EXCEPT for the one of the two pieces that has wheels. I tried customer service. Of course, Amazon's automated customer service is pathetic. It does not qualify for return, so I am stuck with a dry erase board that I have to lean against the wall--all for $152. At this point, I don't recommend buying anything with the Amazon brand, since they do not back up their products with good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mobile Dry Erase Board is Great
customer_reviews.text: The dry erase board is easy to assemble and is mobile. Much better than attaching one to a wall. The ability to flip the board makes the dry erase board twice the actual size.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J Magness

customer_reviews.title: Product excellent. Packaging and shipping sucked.
customer_reviews.text: The whiteboard is excellent, great value and will work perfectly for my online business tips show "Whiteboard Wednesdays with Dean" on my Facebook page. I am however absolutely disgusted with the packaging of the product, I even requested it to be put in Amazon packaging based on previous reviews it was not. The packaging was severely damaged and nothing was secured. Also UPS has become extremely lazy and left this out on the street by my mailbox rather than actually putting it by my garage door as instructed. Even worse is that it has been raining about every other day, luckily my wife saw it shortly before it rained and was able to retrieve it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Damaged merchandise
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several of these dry erase boards for my business. Every order arrives with damaged boxes. However, the first boards we assembled we loved, so we ordered more. Again, the boards arrived in damaged packaging, and one of the boards was missing the above items. I tried to issue a return, but amazon says I cannot return this item. I have looked for email or other ways to contact customer service to request the missing items, but I have been unable to locate contact information. If this issue can’t be resolved, I doubt I will order this type of product from amazon basics again.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Item is defective.
customer_reviews.text: The board arrived promptly and well packaged in cardboard. Easy to assemble. BUT, the actual whiteboard writing surface is defective; one side is relatively smooth while the reverse is visibly creased and bubbly, with the uneven defect running in a vertical pattern right in the middle of the board. It's really distracting and very visible. This was not noticeable until we assembled and removed the protective cellophane film. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitating to purchase this mobile white board due to others' reviews about packaging damaged during the shipping. But mine was ok, since it's a huge piece, so I believe a little bit broken of the outer box covers are acceptable. The installation is easy even though there's no instruction came along. It took me about 20 minutes. And I like the full-length pens holder which makes it very convenient. The 2-sided board with 360° rotation gives you more writing space. The casters with locks are the plus, especially when you have kids around. Overall, I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: I received both my original order and a replacement order - both were without essential hardware to assemble the white board, including the wheels, screws, brackets, etc. Amazon processed a refund for me after the second instance of the problem, but clearly there's a bigger supply issue happening here that needs to be investigated.
customer_reviews.author: C. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Shipping damage....twice
customer_reviews.text: Gave up after the second try. Incredible waste. First board came missing half the accessories. Box had clearly broken open and spilled parts. Second arrived with even worse damage, a dented board, and also missing parts. Giving up. Can't ship back. Not enough between the two to make it work. Refunded, but a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Bunsen

customer_reviews.title: Surface Imperfections, Mangled Box
customer_reviews.text: It works, it's a whiteboard. The box it came in was in terrible condition, some of the tape was pulled off, pieces of cardboard were ripped. The board doesn't seem to have suffered from the trip, and the surface imperfections probably came from the manufacturer. I wish it were heavier so there was less wiggle when I write on it. All things considered it's a fair whiteboard and I'll put it to use. I don't feel great about the price and regret not doing more research beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Keene

customer_reviews.title: Nice white board that is pretty easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I couldn’t find any directions (up until the end when I discovered them wrapped up in the white board itself. Totally my own fault. Anyway, product went together basically by looking at a pic of the final product. Now that I’m teaching online, ideally I can replicate what our classroom would have looked like!
customer_reviews.author: cocncwcn

customer_reviews.title: Problems with delivery but solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped but took a total of five days and needed it prior to Mon, so make sure you give yourself enough time. The board itself came damaged (dented on the side) and the box it arrived in was ripped across 5 different edges. However, it works as expected and the 2 inch dent on the side doesn't hinder it. I'm keeping it as I need it now and can't go another week without one. The size is just right and able to flip the board with ease.
customer_reviews.author: allen babauta

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: My husband put it together quickly and was surprised: the directions were easy to follow, all the holes lined up and were properly drilled, and it included all needed tools. The board is study, rolls well, locks in place, and has a good spring-loaded clip to keep it from flipping. His one piece of advice was to be careful not to over tighten the screws. In all, a good purchase. It helps that it arrived a full two days early, too.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P. Strehl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Came in a box all beat up. There’s alittle damage on the sides (I can live with that) but It’s missing the wheels!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephnola

customer_reviews.title: Not eligible to return, was missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Shipping box was poorly taped. No wheels, foot bars, or hardware were included. I got the board and the four long frame bars, nothing else. And Amazon's website won't let me initiate any kind of return/replace dialogue because it is marked "not eligible for return". Because of that, I can't even request a refund. I now wish I'd read all the existing questions, as others have said it arrived without the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy !
customer_reviews.text: I'm setting up office at home and needed a whiteboard, after looking at many things i ordered this item. The box was packed nicely and it was good. And the best prat is the assembling the board. It was super easy and the instruction was good and clear. I was able to install the board by myself, without any other help. The board is big and strudy. It's not light. Overall, it was easy starting from ordering to install, would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Prabhu

customer_reviews.title: It's basic, and it works.
customer_reviews.text: Solid white board that provides a clean writing service and versatility with the rotating board. Overall a great addition to our office. Unrelated to the quality of the product, the box it was delivered in gave the appearance that Amazon had delivered it by dropping it from 12,000 feet - but everything was in working order inside.
customer_reviews.author: BadTactic

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality
customer_reviews.text: Given the price, and the much higher prices quoted on the office-supply sites, I was concerned that this product wouldn't be up to snuff. I was wrong -- it went together beautifully and precisely, all the parts were present and intact, and the packaging was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: pieces don't fit together.
customer_reviews.text: I would be very happy with it except for one problem...the bolts don't fit into the holes. There are 4 bolts on the upper frame, two on each side. One one side they went in just fine, on the other they simply won't go in the holes, so they are sticking out. The holes are too small. I even tried all the different bolts in the holes, but none of them fit. IT is a little unstable since I can't get the bolts all of the way in, but it still works for us and so not worth the trouble to return it. Good size. I wish it was taller, but I am tall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useable, but not stable
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was very easy and painless with the tools provided. The shelf is large enough to hold a couple markers and erasers. The flipping mechanism does not snap into place by itself, so you have to guide the board into the bottom groove when flipping. My biggest complaint about this thing is the sturdiness. Compared to larger commercial mobile whiteboards, this board is unacceptably unstable. As soon as you touch the board with a marker or eraser, it starts to vibrate and wobble. This is annoying and distracting. So far, the only remedy I found was to hold onto the board as I write on it. I'm still looking for ways to weigh it down to see if it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS AND I CANT RETURN/REPLACE IT! I AM OUT $150
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to help make home schooling a little easier for my children. When I recieved it most parts were missing from it. Now it says it has a no return policy. I am out of $150.00. I dont just have 150.00 to throw away like this. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Broadwater

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The legs were missing from the box. I waited too long to open it and destroyed the box in trying to get everything out I wasn’t able to easily return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: wow! I have to say amazon is amazing! This item first came and missing the screw and they send me another one right away! This is why I love amazon service! And this item is amazing! I am not good at assemble but this is what I did! I assemble everything! I put at my office so useful! Not only use for my work and also can give my son a class! I teach him! Great! Especially for the time of corona viruses!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: It will arrive damaged, but could be usable.
customer_reviews.text: The whiteboard itself is fine so far (only had it for about a week). But it arrived looking like it went through a 15 round fight and lost. The board had giant dents all on one side (other side was usable). Contacted amazon and they sent out a replacement board. Just received the replacement, and this one looked like it was delivered by Ace Venture Pet Detective. One of the corners was dented and the corner plastic cap popped off, exposing the inside wood. It does appear to be a good board, it's just a shame they can't package and ship it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: The whiteboard surface is good. It cleans completely. You might want to order an eraser along. The pen which came along the board works fine and sticks on the board. That's handy. Love love these dry erase boards. Easy for mom and child to write down math problems and solve them separately. Easy to use to explain topics instead of a large bulky dry erase board. Awesome purchase in the time of online learning.
customer_reviews.author: Chick Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product was worth paying a few pounds more. There are cheaper versions on Amazon but this is an excellent product and very well made. It came completed with instructions and was very easy to mount on the wall even for only one person. The reverse side is not a whiteboard, it aluminium and looks great too if you wanted to use it the other way around as just a magnet board.
customer_reviews.author: Araseli Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Practical and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Assembled just in 10 minutes. Very straight forward, did not even use the user's manual to assemble. Wheels are very smooth, has a lock that locks great. Two sided board, easy to flip. Very easy to carry, white board part comes out very easily without removing any screws. use white board markers and you would not have any residue.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: First of I want to say this board is very sturdy. I bought this for my son to study. When he has some questions I can help him with explaining on white board. It is easy to be set up and it is really much bigger than I have expected. Satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melodyyin

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The whiteboard is fine; easy to assemble, and generally does what it says on the box. That said, you get what you pay for. In moving it the other day, one of the castors broke off. There doesn't appear to be such a thing as replacement parts for this (see: "answered questions"), so you're on your own for how to fix it. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Louis Bennett

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth buying. I like it.
customer_reviews.text: The white board is of good quality. Simple and convenient to install. Cost-effective and practical. It is worth buying satisfaction. The writing is very clear. It’s easy to wipe.,and the bracket type is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan T

customer_reviews.title: Great product, awful packaging that caused damage to the product.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived and the box was completely destroyed. The box used to package this product was so oversized that it just broke apart when the carrier tried to handle it. It was not supported in the weak spots. When I opened it I put the frame together. That was easy to do. The when I picked up the board to install it I saw the damage at the bottom. Unfortunately my classes start next week so I don’t have time to wait for a new one. Everything else about the product is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Missing Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Hardware is missing so it is not functional. Amazon will not issue refund or send missing parts. Do not purchase if you want all of the parts and a functional mobile dry erase board.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: pros - good frame construction and design erases clean so far nice size cons - ordered three of these, all have defects in whiteboard face. one was bad enough it had to be returned (thrown away for replacement). If you can deal with the fact that the surface is not flat in all areas, works good enough. Damage possibly due to extremely poor packaging and/or delivery and handling
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Great white board
customer_reviews.text: Initially I did not find the instruction manual, but then I did. It was stuck inside the white board, make sure to open the plastic cover. Great price, half of that from other sellers. . There was damage to package but not to the white board itself. Double sided use, easy to assemble, all tools are included.
customer_reviews.author: Riya

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy as it came incomplete.
customer_reviews.text: Non of the parts came to assemble. Amazon refunded money and didn’t want it back. Threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT 91 inches tall
customer_reviews.text: This whiteboard is a great size, the assembly was easy, but I got it because I am pretty tall guy and so have a whiteboard that was 7.5 feet tall (approx. 91 inches) at its highest point sounded very appealing. It is barely 6 feet tall. Still seems like a good product just very disappointed that it was presented inaccurately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: You can write stuff on the both side and it is easy to put together, and it have wheels on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very neat.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. This is a very nice white board and seems to be built very sturdy. We ordered it for in our kids play room and it’s going to be perfect. I really like it because it’s so big I don’t think we would get it any smaller. It gives the kids plenty of room to draw anything in their imagination. We would definitely recommend this for people with kids.
customer_reviews.author: donna hughes

customer_reviews.title: great for home schooling
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this because he also teaches ESL online. It’s an extremely useful tool for online teaching or homeschooling. We’re having a baby soon so this will also serve as duty/chores/bulletin board for the family. Great product that’s easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Mengnan Li

customer_reviews.title: Really big and useful white board
customer_reviews.text: I'm an IT engineer, sometimes I need to write some algorithm to help me fix some question. So a big white board is a good helper. With this, I can draw work-flow, and conditions to go loop or go judgement. And I can also use this to teach my children math, he is a junior who starts to learn calculate. Really thanks this big white board.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Dubb

customer_reviews.title: Not Returnable - Check Policy.  Pieces Bent, Imperfections on Surface.
customer_reviews.text: Multiple metal pieces were bent. There are countless imperfections and dents in the whiteboard surface. It's not flat and with a light reflecting, it looks like someone took a hammer and hit the surface multiple times. I would spend the extra $ and go higher in price point.
customer_reviews.author: dlee325

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I teach a homeschool at my house and I love this. It is super easy to move and tuck away. It is big enough for all the kids to see and I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble, sturdy, double sided and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to assemble. I bought this for my mom as she is trying to start an after school program at home after she retaires. It is lightweight and at the same time sturday. It is easy to assemble and has double sided. My dad assembled it in less than 15 mins. It is also very big and easy to move around and super easy to clean as well. Perfect for a daycare afterschool or school and home use! Recommend 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Very simple to put up, a little heavy so it’ll be easier with 2 but if you don’t have another it’s possible alone. Black marks on the photo are edited in, just in case that wasn't clear. I use adhesive strips to attach it to the wall. Monitors are 24" and 21" for scale.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Meck

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: The board is what I needed for, and it was relatively easy to assemble. My son wanted this for his study to set a daily schedule. It's really good for us to show steps and discuss how to resolve math problems. With the wheels, we can move easily. We are satisfied with the good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Really good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar set that was a bit cheaper but it only came with one small "board" and no magnetic storage pouch. One is for the kids to use for drawing and the other is for us to keep a list of what we plan on buying at the grocery store. Very happy with this product. Even the markers that come with it feel of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: AP Carters

customer_reviews.title: This is great- most buy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Unlike some whiteboards I have had in the past, the surface cleans much easier and does not leave remnants of past writing even if not erased right away. Affordable white board that is easy to hang on the wall. I bought this for my home office since I am spending more time working at home due to the pandemic. Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: lisa fencil

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product! avoid
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and the stand for the white board was missing. i could assemble. Where do I go for a refund?!??
customer_reviews.author: Profdude

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and I love the fact that I can flip it over and start fresh, if I’m not ready to erase my old notes or ideas.
customer_reviews.author: OHXPerine

customer_reviews.title: Several issues with the product
customer_reviews.text: The board looks good. But we are quite unhappy. 1. The package was not well packed. The box was broken. And parts fell out of the box. We had to search carefully at the porch to find parts. 2. One corner is misaligned and broken. Please look at the picture. 3. We followed the instruction to install but we absolutely had no idea why it has two extra sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Jianfei Xue

customer_reviews.title: Great white board!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This white board is really cool, quality is great, you can easily turn it around, eventually it will automatically stop in the middle, you can use marker to write whatever you want on it and can be erased thoroughly by a dry erase. You can put some thought and reminders either by writing on it or have a sticker with little magnetic block, really like it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Okay whiteboard.
customer_reviews.text: It's not very sturdy. I have to hold the back of the board most times to write or the board shakes. I'll be keeping it cause it's a hassle to return and the price isn't bad but I wished it was more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Riss

customer_reviews.title: Really big and useful white board
customer_reviews.text: I'm an IT engineer, sometimes I need to write some algorithm to help me fix some question. So a big white board is a good helper. With this, I can draw work-flow, and conditions to go loop or go judgement. And I can also use this to teach my children math, he is a junior who starts to learn calculate. Really thanks this big white board.
customer_reviews.author: Luban

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Ease of assembly and a breeze to clean! Big enough for at home learning and yet not overwhelming. So pleased with this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Classact

customer_reviews.title: Big and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very big and really worth it. I've been searching this for my kids school use and my business use. As now we all "at home" this thing is very useful for us. I like the price of course and really easy to install too
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for our homeschool purposes. This makes our learning mobile!
customer_reviews.author: Sam P

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Does the job excellently. No problems with leaving marks from old notes etc. Good quality build. he gum did not transfer to the board when removed. Small magnets work well with the board but some (older type) big ones, sliding down.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect white board
customer_reviews.text: It's a really large board. Arrived in excellent condition. No warping and not a single scratch. I bought some over door hooks and am able to attach to the back of the door (in portrait orientation) with no drilling/screws needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Day

customer_reviews.title: Perfect classroom sized whiteboard!
customer_reviews.text: This is just great, easy to assemble and looks awesome! Large and durable. Quite happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cees

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, we have 2 now. This product arrived in damaged packaging (looks like it was tampered with in transit, so not the seller's fault). All of the erasers, magnets, and markers were taken from the package, so I didn't get any.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gillson

customer_reviews.title: Great whiteboard for the home office
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I had expected. Great whiteboard, good quality material, stay upright but easy to maneuver. All in all just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: zeroKelvin

customer_reviews.title: trustworthy
customer_reviews.text: Very good packaging, the product is intact after opening, thank the sales staff for their carefulness. The product assembly is very simple, the materials are very delicate, writing and drawing on the board is very smooth, and the double-sided use is also very convenient. In short, it is trustworthy.
customer_reviews.author: love

customer_reviews.title: I was worried about shipping and handing...
customer_reviews.text: Based on the existing reviews, I was worried it would get here broken. Fortunately, it arrived intact and the exterior box was okay. Unit was easy to put together, and seems surprisingly sturdy and well-made. Thanks, AmazonBasics.
customer_reviews.author: seaugust

customer_reviews.title: Nice surface, decent thickness
customer_reviews.text: Great for setting up for homeschooling. I was happy I had already bought extra markers these were smaller and the colors don't always stand out as much as I wanted. I would definitely take it again
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Five Star
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product of Amazon .Easy to assemble and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: It's just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I'm a freelancer and I bought this board to brainstorm at home. This board is very good-looking, and the home of modern style decoration is also very matching. And there's nothing wrong with using it. This is the board I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl bentley

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to contact the seller, but it’s missing the two legs and two leg caps. Part B and G. Also, the instructions are wrapped in the white board.
customer_reviews.author: Tim T

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This product came with missing parts and non returnable so i am stuck with it If you order this product, order at your own risk
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Patel

customer_reviews.title: Wheels broke
customer_reviews.text: Board is very good quality. But the wheels and assembling is very weak. Wheels broke while trying to move the board. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jegan Gopalakrishnan

customer_reviews.title: Nice for at home and school work.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes his whiteboard. Helps him stay on track with his online school assignments. I think I'm going to buy one for myself. Great wipe board for a great price. Absolutely no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Lefferson

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy!
customer_reviews.text: The board was damaged! When the box arrived, it was pretty messed up and the tape wasn’t even holding it together. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ash and Kandi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product/seller
customer_reviews.text: After hours of research I decided to buy two of these. There are great quality and easy to fit and when I contacted the customer service team they were exemplary in assisting me. Fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Shehab Scott

customer_reviews.title: Can I get some support from amazon for this amazon basics product?
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this whiteboard up in order to do homework with my daughter. Upon assembly, it was noted that one face of the whiteboard has a defect and a ding. Also, one of the wheels was broken. Apart from that, the assembly looks very sturdy. Can Amazon please correct these issues?
customer_reviews.author: enrique romo

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I’m super happy with this product. It was easy to assemble and it very good quality materials. There some slight “ghosting” of an expo marker, but cleans up perfectly with water and a terry cloth towel. Looking forward to years of use for at home tutoring.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Built study and the board flips 360 degrees!
customer_reviews.text: I got this white board for my new work-from/home office. It’s way better than I expected! The board flips 360 degrees and the build feels pretty sturdy. I’m really looking forward to using this in the coming weeks. =)
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. My wife is very happy to do her math problems on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: broken wheel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board a month ago. It came nicely and easy to install. But only after 2 weeks, the wheel broken. Now every time when I write on it, it was shaking because of unbalanced wheel. I saw that this has one year warranty. Where can I get a wheel replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Sunnydu

customer_reviews.title: Moveable, easy to erase, help with remote studying
customer_reviews.text: The removable whiteboard is very convenient. You can move around at home. I bought it for my online course,Cleaning is also very easy when using markers.
customer_reviews.author: dill

customer_reviews.title: This product did not come with all the parts necessary to put it together
customer_reviews.text: I am missing parts. This is kind of unacceptable. Either send the parts or give me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Marotske

customer_reviews.title: This item arrived without caster or screws. No way to assemble it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a business purchase for a large corporation. It arrived without screws and casters and no way to assemble the item. We are not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Rood

customer_reviews.title: Wheels hard not working
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product as the wheels very stiff and hard to move when moving board from place to another it stays still causing lots of difficulty and time wasting
customer_reviews.author: Emma Megan

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Looked like the packaging was carelessly done. A whole bunch of flyers stuck inside. Many parts missing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Awesome  whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: Great whiteboard, easy to install in less than 10 mins, got it for homeschooling, absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: MattD

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for education
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and easy to install. The size is big enough for every classroom and lab. Also, it can use two sides. Easy to turn over.
customer_reviews.author: cherry

customer_reviews.title: Rattles when you use it
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I needed and is perfect in all ways but one. The latch at the bottom has a ton of slop in it with no rubber or anything similar to take up the slack. As a result, it moves back and forth while you write or erase. This makes it noisy and difficult to write on. I stuffed a rag in there to help hold it in place. It minimized how much it moves but is still noisy, though less so.
customer_reviews.author: RSail

customer_reviews.title: Good white board
customer_reviews.text: Good looking whiteboard. Bought it for my sister who is a teacher and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: It came in a beat up box with NO parts. Just a big dry erase board. No wheels or frame. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: timothy

customer_reviews.title: A good quality white board with a bad package box!
customer_reviews.text: It is delivered with damages on the whiteboard. The whiteboard is a good quality product but the package needs to be an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: HIMNAE YOO

customer_reviews.title: Fast assembly and great quality
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble and the quality is great. It took me less than 10 minutes to have this ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: fabian Meraz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Its is extremely flimsy and not usable at all. It also arrived full of cracks and wouldn't refund. Terrible item and awful service! Terrible quality and over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Argon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy ease of assembly and 2 large surfaces to write on.  Helps at both work and school
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I bought it for my daughter for school. Keeps her organized
customer_reviews.author: James mcsweeney

customer_reviews.title: Nice Whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice double sided white board. There were a couple small dings on the board when I opened the box, but other than that it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Works well. The dry erase board is sturdy and easy to assemble. exactly what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: COLLIER

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this product comes incomplete. I called amazon and received a replacement that was also incomplete.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Huge bubble in the middle.
customer_reviews.text: The whiteboard i received today. Had a huge bubble in the middle of it. Didnt expect this poor quality for AmazonBasics.
customer_reviews.author: Harsh Tyagi

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to assemble, the only reason I did not 5 star everything is that there was a significant dent on the trim of the board; it still functions properly though, and it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Zachery Chapin

customer_reviews.title: Dents
customer_reviews.text: There were dents on the side of the board. But besides that everything else was good.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Iriarte

customer_reviews.title: Missing part trash from the hell
customer_reviews.text: Reply really donot buy this , rubbish from the hell. Three parts missing , no customer contact. Just really trash board
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh was expecting different
customer_reviews.text: My board came with damage on the white board. Some of the white board is bulging out
customer_reviews.author: Lawren Brinley

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Mobile Dry Erase White Board, metal castors, 36 x 48 Inch
feature_bullets: Mobile magnetic dry-erase board for sharing ideas and getting organized; ideal for home, school, or office
Durable coated-steel dry-erase writing surface erases easily; aluminum frame provides reliable strength
Doubles as a magnetic bulletin board for added versatility; 2-sided board rotates for front and back use
Full-length pen tray conveniently stores accessories; sturdy steel base with 4 lockable metal casters
Measures 48 by 20 by 36 inches; backed by an AmazonBasics 1-year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars232 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
